privacyPolicyDescription: Learn how Mini Notepad protects your privacy and handles your data. We are committed to local-first storage to maximize user privacy.
termsOfServiceDescription: Before using Mini Notepad, please read our Terms of Service. Understand your rights and responsibilities, as well as the scope of our services.
privacySection1Content:
Mini Notepad adopts a local-first design philosophy to maximize your privacy:

  • No Personally Identifiable Information Collected: We do not ask you to provide your name, email, or any personal information
  • No Tracking Technologies Used: We do not use third-party analytics tools, ad tracking, or user behavior analysis
  • No Browsing History Stored: Your browsing history and usage habits are not recorded
  • Technical Data Only: Only when you actively share notes will we temporarily store the note content and sharing settings
privacySection2Content:
Your note data is completely stored on your local device:

  • Local Storage: All notes are saved in the browser's local storage by default, which we cannot access
  • Temporary Cloud Storage: Content is only uploaded to our servers when you actively choose to share notes
  • Automatic Deletion: When you cancel sharing, the relevant data is immediately deleted from our servers
  • Encrypted Transmission: All data transmissions are protected using the HTTPS encryption protocol
privacySection3Content:
We have strict restrictions on data sharing:

  • No Data Sold: We will never sell your personal information or note content to third parties
  • No Commercial Use: Your note content is only used to provide sharing services and is not used for any commercial purposes
  • Legal Requirements: Unless explicitly required by law, we will not disclose your information to any third party
  • Service Providers: The cloud service providers we use all follow strict data protection standards
privacySection4Content:
You have complete control over your data:

  • Right of Access: You can view and access all note data stored locally at any time
  • Right of Deletion: You can delete local notes or cancel cloud sharing at any time
  • Right of Export: You can export notes to Markdown or text format at any time
  • Right of Control: You can choose whether to share notes and when to stop sharing
privacySection5Content:
If you have any questions or suggestions about our privacy policy, please contact us through the following methods:

  • GitHub: Submit an issue in our open-source project
  • Email: Through the contact email in the project description

We will reply as soon as possible after receiving your inquiry.
termsSection1Content:
Mini Notepad is a free online notepad service designed to provide users with a simple, fast, and secure note-taking experience:

  • Scope of Service: Provides online text editing, local storage, and cloud sharing features
  • Technical Support: Supports Markdown syntax, theme switching, and multilingual interface
  • Free Commitment: We promise to provide core features for free permanently, with no hidden charges
  • Open Source Project: This project uses an open-source license, and the code is transparent and reviewable
termsSection2Content:
When using our services, you are responsible for the following:

  • Content Responsibility: You are fully responsible for the note content you create and share
  • Legal Use: You must not use this service to create, store, or share illegal or non-compliant content
  • Respect Others: You must not infringe upon the intellectual property rights, privacy rights, or other legitimate rights and interests of others
  • Safe Use: Keep your sharing links safe and avoid disclosing sensitive information
  • Prohibition of Abuse: You must not use technical means to attack or interfere with the normal operation of the service
termsSection3Content:
We strive to provide stable and reliable services, but we need you to understand the following limitations:

  • Service Availability: We do not guarantee 100% service availability and may be temporarily interrupted due to maintenance, upgrades, etc.
  • Data Security: Although we take reasonable security measures, we cannot guarantee absolute data security
  • Content Review: We do not proactively review user content but reserve the right to delete illegal content
  • Limitation of Liability: To the extent permitted by law, we are not liable for losses caused by the use of this service
termsSection4Content:
If you have any disputes or opinions about our services:

  • Friendly Consultation: We recommend resolving disputes through friendly consultation first
  • Contact Information: You can contact us via GitHub or email
  • Applicable Law: The interpretation and dispute resolution of these terms shall be governed by relevant local laws and regulations
  • Terms Changes: We reserve the right to modify these terms, and major changes will be notified in advance

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: View all feature updates and improvement history of Mini Notepad, and witness the complete development process of the product from the initial version to the present.
changelog.footer: Thank you for following our product development journey!

v081.title: Enhanced Template Preview
v081.description: Added complete template preview function, users can view the complete Markdown rendering effect of the template in a separate page, optimizing the navigation experience.

templatePreview.title: Template Preview Page
templatePreview.description: Added a separate template preview page (/templates/[id]), supporting complete Markdown rendering, including mathematical formulas, code highlighting, etc., providing an immersive template browsing experience.

previewButton.title: Preview Button
previewButton.description: Added a preview button on each template card in the template market, allowing users to view the complete content and format of the template before deciding to use it.

navigationImprovement.title: Navigation Optimization
navigationImprovement.description: Optimized the navigation logic of the back button: the template market returns to the homepage, and the template preview returns to the template market, providing a clearer navigation path.

v080.title: Keyboard Shortcut System
v080.description: Implemented a complete keyboard shortcut system, providing support for 8 core shortcuts, greatly improving editing efficiency and professional user experience.

keyboardShortcuts.title: Complete Shortcut System
keyboardShortcuts.description: Added 8 core shortcuts, including Alt+N to create a new note, Alt+O to open a file, Ctrl+S to save, Ctrl+P to print, F11 for focus mode, Ctrl+B to switch the sidebar, Ctrl+Shift+S to share, Ctrl+/ to view help, etc., conforming to the usage habits of mainstream editors.

shortcutHints.title: Menu Shortcut Hints
shortcutHints.description: The corresponding shortcut labels are automatically displayed on the right side of all menu items, intelligently adapting to different operating systems (Mac displays the ‚åò symbol, Windows displays Ctrl), providing an intuitive shortcut learning experience.

shortcutHelp.title: Shortcut Help Dialog
shortcutHelp.description: Added a shortcut help dialog that can be quickly opened with Ctrl+/, displaying all available shortcuts categorized by function, providing a friendly shortcut learning and query interface.

browserConflict.title: Browser Conflict Optimization
browserConflict.description: Optimized the shortcut scheme to avoid conflicts with browser system-level shortcuts, changed the new note and open file shortcuts to Alt combination keys, ensuring that shortcuts work properly in all browsers.

v070.title: Background Music Function
v070.description: Added background music playback function, providing a variety of white noise options such as running water and rain sounds, helping users stay focused and relaxed while writing.

backgroundMusic.title: Background Music Player
backgroundMusic.description: Supports simultaneous playback of multiple white noises, including running water and rain sounds, with free control of volume and mute, providing an immersive writing environment.

v060.title: Modernization of Editor Interface
v060.description: Comprehensively upgraded the editor interface design, adopting a menu bar layout to provide a more professional and elegant user experience.

menuBarLayout.title: Menu Bar Layout
menuBarLayout.description: Transformed the toolbar into a menu bar design similar to Notion and Google Docs, including File, Insert, View and other menus, which is more in line with user habits.

modernUI.title: Modern Visual Design
modernUI.description: Adopts frosted glass effect, exquisite shadows and smooth transition animations to provide a more elegant and refined interface experience.

titleArea.title: Title Area Optimization
titleArea.description: Redesigned the title input area, adopting a simple and elegant style, hover effect and theme color cursor to enhance visual quality.

v050.title: User Authentication and Cloud Storage
v050.description: Launched a complete user authentication system and cloud storage function to achieve secure data synchronization across devices.

userAuth.title: User Authentication System
userAuth.description: Complete login and registration system, including password reset function, to achieve secure user account management and data protection.

cloudSync.title: Cloud Storage and Synchronization
cloudSync.description: Real-time cloud synchronization function, allowing users to access notes across multiple devices, supporting automatic conflict resolution.

v040.title: Blog System and Enhanced Focus Mode
v040.description: Launched a complete blog system, enhanced the interaction experience of focus mode, and provided more convenient one-click operation.

blogSystem.title: Blog System
blogSystem.description: A brand new blog function that supports article publishing, category management, and content sharing, providing users with a richer content creation platform.

quickFocusStart.title: One-Click Focus Start
quickFocusStart.description: Added a one-click focus start button, allowing users to quickly enter focus mode and start an efficient collaborative writing experience.

quickExitFocus.title: Quick Exit Focus Mode
quickExitFocus.description: Optimized the focus mode exit experience, adding a floating quick exit button in the lower right corner, which does not take up editing space and is more convenient.

v030.title: Enhanced Focus Experience
v030.description: Improve the user experience of focus mode, enhance legal compliance, and upgrade the functions of the Markdown editor.

focusModeSidebar.title: Focus Mode Sidebar Enhancement
focusModeSidebar.description: Added a switchable sidebar function in focus mode to facilitate users' quick access to the note list while focusing on editing.

legalCompliance.title: Legal Compliance Documents
legalCompliance.description: Added privacy agreement and terms of service pages to ensure users understand data processing policies and usage specifications.

markdownPlugin.title: Markdown Editor Upgrade
markdownPlugin.description: Using the new Markdown plugin to provide a better editing experience and richer format support.

v020.title: Template Market and Internationalization
v020.description: Launched a complete template market system, expanded multilingual support, and added image upload and sidebar functions.

templateMarket.title: Template Market System
templateMarket.description: The new template market function provides 7 categories of professional templates, including business, education, and technology, which can be applied to notes with one click.

hindiSupport.title: Hindi Support
hindiSupport.description: Added Hindi interface support to expand the product's global coverage and better serve the Hindi-speaking user base.

imageUpload.title: Image Upload Function
imageUpload.description: Support direct uploading and inserting images in notes to enhance the multimedia processing capabilities of the Markdown editor.

sidebarFeatures.title: Sidebar Function Enhancement
sidebarFeatures.description: Added sidebar switch function and batch deletion of notes function to improve the convenience and efficiency of note management.

bugFixes.title: Problem Fixes and Optimizations
bugFixes.description: Fixed multiple user-reported issues such as template page navigation, note list saving, and reference defects.

v010.title: Core Function Establishment
v010.description: Project initialization, establishing core online notepad functions, including Markdown support, sharing function, and multi-theme system.

projectInit.title: Project Initialization
projectInit.description: Establish a modern online notepad application framework based on Next.js 15 and React 19.

shareFeature.title: Note Sharing Function
shareFeature.description: Implement the note sharing function, users can generate sharing links to allow others to view their note content.

noteHistory.title: Note History Management
noteHistory.description: Add note history function, users can view and manage all previously created notes.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode Support
darkMode.description: Implement a complete dark theme system to protect users' eyesight and provide a comfortable night-time experience.

focusMode.title: Focus Editing Mode
focusMode.description: Launched the focus mode function, providing a distraction-free full-screen editing environment to improve writing focus.

markdownSupport.title: Markdown Editing Support
markdownSupport.description: Integrate a complete Markdown editor that supports real-time preview, syntax highlighting, and formatting functions.

i18nSupport.title: Internationalization Support
i18nSupport.description: Establish a multi-language support system, initially supporting Chinese and English bilingual interface switching.

seoOptimization.title: SEO Optimization
seoOptimization.description: Improve website SEO configuration, including keyword optimization, sitemap generation, and search engine optimization.
